Posts.Content: On Aug 17, 2016 5:02 PM rick1963 wrote: My wife has an aggresive form of breast cancer,the last 12 months of my life have been hell,am trying to keep it together. My brother works for a mining company in Suriname,thats a country in South America.There "" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">http://America.There " target="_blank" rel="nofollow">America.There are amerindians living there and there is something called grama(some sort of herb) that they use to treat cancer.My "" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">http://cancer.My " target="_blank" rel="nofollow">cancer.My brother swears that it actually works and that allot of Cancer patients "really" get cured. I know there is allot of quackery out there and I do not want to get into big pharma conspiracy theory discussions.but "" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">http://discussions.but " target="_blank" rel="nofollow">discussions.but what if? I know that the rain forest contains like a billion type of plants and these amerindians have been living there for thousands of years,much longer then our modern medical science,should i give it a try? or even consider it? personally I would give it a go it's probably a long shot but if you can get the herb then give it a go .if it has only worked for a few people your wife might be one of those few if it works brilliant if not well she ate a few herbs its worth a go  Josie
Posts.Title: advice needed

Posts.Content: On Aug 18, 2016 10:24 PM rick1963 wrote: thanks,i think the moderator blocked or something,I am not advertising,just trying to get advise on this matter as i dont have a clue. its triple w dot akuriowisdom and then com.. please advise,is it quackery??? it says on the site not to stop tradition medicine so really you have nothing to lose except the cost of the herb well i googled it and it is the flower from the grass hence it only appears after the rain . good luck  josie

Posts.Content: On Aug 19, 2016 2:44 PM rick1963 wrote: On Aug 19, 2016 12:41 AM sandyjulia wrote: sounds like a good plan, good luck, Sandy, I contacted them today and had a long chat with the young fellow,he was very rational and did not try to sound like a miracle worker. the stuff is quite pricey but I am placing my order in the morning,really hope it will works. Fingers crossed for you :)
